Core¶

A variety of general, reusable functions for cloudburst

concurrent(func, input_list[, executor, …]) Concurrently execute a function on a list
mkdir(dirname) Make a directory given a directory name (or path), ignore if directory already exists
query(folder, filetypes) Query folder by filetype
write_list_to_file(filename, input_list) Write a list to a text file with each element on a new line
get_list_from_file(filename) Get a list from a text file with each element on a new line
write_dict_to_file(filename, input_dict[, …]) Write a dictionary to a json file
get_dict_from_file(filename)
line_coeff_from_segment(point_a, point_b) Given a line segment (two points), find the slope (m) and y-intercept (b) of line y=mx+b
tri_centroid(vertex_a, vertex_b, vertex_c) Find the centroid of any triangle given its vertices
quad_centroid(vertex_a, vertex_b, vertex_c, …) Find the centroid of any quadrilateral given its vertices
point_in_rect(rect, point) Given a rectangle and a point, check if the point is inside the rectangle
